title: Meet the Haas Brothers, the furniture designers loved by Donatella Versace, Leonardo DiCaprio and now Rihanna
text:
Who knows where Rihanna first saw a piece of the Haas Brothers work. At Donatella Versace’s place in Milan perhaps. Or Tobey Maguire’s LA mansion?

Was it a furry footstool complete with horns; a gaping mouth monster with flashing lights for eyes (hand-beaded by South African women); or a softly rounded ceramic piece so finely finished with liquid glaze and Sevres-like gold detailing that at first glance the vaginal, gilded slit isn’t the most obvious thing about it?

But see it she did. Earlier this year, Ms Fenty asked the twins to design a base for her 504-page book, to be published by Phaidon in the UK later this month.

description: Who knows where Rihanna first saw a piece of the Haas Brothers work.
